2025-0708
2025-10-10AAFCFarm Products Agencies ActAppointment of an auditor for the Canadian Turkey Marketing Agency for fiscal years 2025 to 2031 Order appointing RLB LLP of Guelph, Ontario to be the auditor for the Canadian Turkey Marketing Agency for each of the fiscal years ending on December 31 during the years 2025 to 2031.N/A
subject: Appointment of an auditor for the Canadian Turkey Marketing Agency for fiscal years 2025 to 2031
precis: Order appointing RLB LLP of Guelph, Ontario to be the auditor for the Canadian Turkey Marketing Agency for each of the fiscal years ending on December 31 during the years 2025 to 2031.
